title: Firefox for Android 47.0a2 Aurora

notes.note: Add ability to show system notification to highlight features on browser update
Add "Show/Hide web fonts" in advanced settings to reduce bandwidth and data
Remove Favicons in Awesomebar to prevent HTTPS spoofing
Remove support for Android web runtime (WebRT)
"Open multiple links"  setting under “Customize” has been renamed to “Tab Queue”
WebCrypto: PBKDF2 supports SHA-2 hash algorithms

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 2.3
 - Android 4.0
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
